description: Try our easy to follow Carrot Mug Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mug cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Winter,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Microwave,High tea,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Carrot Mug Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add carrot to microwave-proof mug and microwave for 1 minute to soften.
Combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl, then fold in carrot. Transfer mixture to mug and microwave for a further 1 1/2 minutes or until cooked through. Serve warm.
